DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the present study is to develop a long term cost-effectiveness (efficient protocol, playful context, and practical strategy) training program for school-age children with Cerebral Palsy. Also, evaluate efficacy of Kinect-assisted bilateral arm training program for children with Cerebral Palsy.
DOC.brief_title: Development of Kinect-assisted Home-based Bilateral Arm Training Program for Cerebral Palsy

The inclusion criteria of typically developing children are: 1. absence of medical or developmental diseases which would affect physical and cognitive performances 2. having normal corrected vision 3. studying in regular education classroom in primary school for the 612 yearold children.
